[ U ] someone's ability to experience or show sexual feelings: She said that many adults are in denial about adolescent sexuality.
[ U ] the fact or action of showing sexual feelings: This film contains graphic sexuality and nudity.
[ C or U ] the fact of someone being sexually or romantically attracted to people of a particular gender, or more than one gender: All people need to be treated with respect, regardless of sexuality, race or gender. I spoke to young LGBT women about how the film helped them to realise their own sexualities. Synonym
sexual orientation
[ C ] people who are sexually or romantically attracted to people of a particular gender, or more than one gender, considered as a group: We want to ensure that government policies are inclusive of all sexualities. There was a mixture of genders and sexualities in the audience.
